Params: Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory301.png
DialogEnable
Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab
Noctis
Where am I...?
Noctis slowly opens his eyes. He gets really confused by the sky that seems extremely close, and decides to just space out.
Captain... He's awake.
Noctis hears a voice over his stomach. He feels even more confused, but suddenly remembers why he ended up lying here.
You're quite tough. No. 21's full strength only knocked you off for 3 minutes... Well, if you were on the battlefield, 3 minutes are more than enough to kill you or turn you into Corrupted.
Noctis
****! Get off me!
Noctis' hands and feet are tightly tied together, so he can only wriggle around, trying to shake off the Construct standing on his belly.
No. 21
I'm standing on a caterpillar!
Despite Noctis' desperate struggles, No. 21 just spreads her arms out and maintains perfect balance.
Noctis
I ain't no caterpillar! At least a centipede!
Fuming with anger, Noctis curls his legs to make a "kip-up" move in Kowloong martial arts using his core strength, bringing himself back on his feet.
Finally thrown off, No. 21 does a somersault in the air and lands firmly on the ground.

Noctis exerts all his strength to break the steel rope that ties up his arms. He quickly strikes a fighting stance against Vera and No. 21, albeit his still tied-up feet make him look more funny than fierce.
Vera
Gee, the rope is used by the Support Force to tie up large cargo... Can he even break that?
Noctis
****! That thing will never hold me back...
Noctis
It was supposed to be a 1-on-1! I would never lose to you if you didn't cheat!
No. 21
Still looking for excuses... Noctis is such a "sore loser."
Noctis
Shut up!
Smiling, Vera walks to No. 21 and pats her on the head.
Vera
As a member of mine, No. 21 is considered my "weapon."
Vera
Just like this katana, I was just using an available weapon against you. I think that makes perfect sense.
Noctis opens his mouth but cannot find a word. He just feels something is not quite right.
No. 21
Noctis is a fool indeed...
Vera
Besides, nobody would fight with dignity in a real battle... How did you even survive until now in the Purifying Force?
Purifying Force members often have to face the most desperate, vicious enemies in their missions.
Noctis
Tsk, I know what you mean...
Unlike the mindless Corrupted who will only charge directly at their targets, the Purifying Force would do anything to survive, no matter how despicable.
Vera
The victory was mine... But if you are too much of a loser to take it, you are always welcome to challenge me again.
With his hands on the hips, Noctis lets out a sigh and punches the steel rope binding his feet loose. No. 21 and her Co-Bot immediately move to Vera.
Noctis
Whatever... I'll listen to you.
Noctis
But don't get me wrong. I didn't lose to you... It's just that...
Noctis looks at his robotic arm. The damage marks on it are still clearly visible.
Noctis
Unlike someone, I made the promise, and I'll stick to it no matter what.
Vera returns her katana to its sheath. She smiles and gestures to No. 21 so that she can relax.
Vera
Well, as the captain of Cerberus, I'd like to give you a piece of advice.
Vera
You want to go back to the Purifying Force to investigate the murder of its ex-captain, right?
Noctis
How did you know...?
Vera
Because I have a brain and eyes... And I also know how to use my "weapons."
Vera
You seem like the type easily influenced by anger. It's your weakness... But it can also become your strength.
Vera
While you are in Cerberus, find out the real target that you should unleash your anger on... That way, maybe you'll get one step closer to the truth you want.
As Vera is about to leave, she pats on No. 21's back, signaling her to follow. Left alone, Noctis is still pondering Vera's words.
Noctis
Cerberus... From evil-hunting hounds to puppy watchdogs, huh?
Noctis looks at the Cerberus emblem on his new coating. It is a symbol of the hellhound. Despite its three ferocious heads, to most people's surprise, it is a guardian.
Vera
What are you still doing there?! Hurry!
Noctis scratches his head and quickly follows along.
Vera
You can drive, right? We need to drive to the shuttle pad.
Hearing the voice calling him from afar, Noctis sneers and points at his nose.
Noctis
Are you serious? There's no such thing as "cannot" in my dictionary. I'm a fantastic driver!
